# Adrenalin Next - Gym & Fitness Website

## Project Overview
Adrenalin Next is a comprehensive fitness and gym website built with Next.js 14, providing educational materials, calculators, blog posts, and services for fitness enthusiasts.

Website: https://gym-adrenalin.com.ua

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- **Runtime**: Node.js 20.x
- **Language**: TypeScript 5.1.6
- **UI Library**: React 18.2.0
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.3.3
- **Database**: MongoDB with Mongoose 8.0.1
- **Authentication**: NextAuth 4.24.5
- **Forms**: React Hook Form 7.46.1 with Yup validation
- **Animations**: Framer Motion 10.16.4
- **Icons**: Lucide React 0.284.0

## Project Structure

### Important Sections

#### 1. Educational Materials (/app/learn)
Comprehensive fitness education organized into four main categories:

**Introduction**
- /learn/intro - Getting started with fitness

**Training**
- /learn/training - Training fundamentals
- /learn/training/warm-up - Warm-up techniques
- /learn/training/basic-exercises - Basic exercise guides
- /learn/training/load-progression - Progressive overload principles

**Nutrition**
- /learn/nutrition - Nutrition basics
- /learn/nutrition/basics - Fundamental nutrition concepts
- /learn/nutrition/before-after-training - Pre and post-workout nutrition
- /learn/nutrition/diet-for-weight-lost - Weight loss diet guide
- /learn/nutrition/diet-for-gaining-weight - Muscle gain diet guide

**Recovery**
- /learn/recover - Recovery fundamentals
- /learn/recover/enough-rest - Importance of rest
- /learn/recover/overtraining - Overtraining prevention

**Motivation**
- /learn/motivation - Motivation fundamentals
- /learn/motivation/timidity - Overcoming gym intimidation
- /learn/motivation/finding-motivation - Finding your motivation
- /learn/motivation/power-of-discipline - Building discipline

#### 2. Health Calculators (/app/calcs)
Interactive health and fitness calculators:

- /calcs - Calculator hub page
- /calcs/imt-calculator - BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator
- /calcs/fat-calculator - Body fat percentage calculator
- /calcs/calories-calculator - Daily calorie intake calculator

#### 3. Blog (/app/blog)
Dynamic blog section with posts loaded from MongoDB database:

- /blog - Blog listing page with pagination and filtering
- /blog/[id] - Individual blog post pages (dynamic routing)
- Posts are fetched using `@/app/_services/post.service.ts`
- Blog posts are included in sitemap.xml dynamically

**Blog Categories:**
- #Training - 12+ posts about workout techniques, exercise guides, training programs
- #Nutrition - 4+ posts about dietary advice, meal planning, nutrition science
- #Motivation - 5+ posts about mental aspects of fitness, motivation strategies, discipline

**Popular Blog Topics:**
- Muscle building and hypertrophy science
- Weight loss strategies and timing
- Beginner exercise guides
- Nutrition timing (pre/post workout)
- Overcoming gym anxiety and building confidence
- Training frequency and optimal schedules
- Women's specific training considerations
- Building strength foundation and progressive overload

#### 4. Services (/app/services)
Gym services and offerings:

- /services - Services overview page
- /services/cart - Service cart/booking page

#### 5. Other Pages
- / - Homepage
- /contacts - Contact information

## Key Files

### Configuration
- `package.json` - Project dependencies and scripts
- `app/sitemap.ts` - Dynamic sitemap generation including blog posts
- `const/routeSitemap.ts` - Static route definitions for sitemap

### Services
- `app/_services/post.service.ts` - Blog post data service (MongoDB integration)

### Layouts
Each section has its own layout.tsx file for consistent styling and navigation within that section.

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run start` - Start production server
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Important Notes
- Uses Next.js App Router (not Pages Router)
- All educational content is organized hierarchically with nested routes
- Blog posts are dynamically loaded from MongoDB database with three main categories: Training, Nutrition, Motivation
- Blog content covers practical topics from beginner exercises to advanced training strategies
- Calculators provide interactive health metrics (BMI, body fat %, daily calories)
- Each major section has its own loading states and layouts
- Authentication is handled via NextAuth
- All content is in Ukrainian language (lang="uk")
